description: Number of integers m such that 5^n < 2^m < 5^(n+1).
comments: Let A(x) be the counting function of terms a(n) = 3 for n <= x. Then lim A(x)/x = 3*log(2)/log(5) - 1 = 0.29202967... as x goes to infinity. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Mar 21 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Definition clarified by _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 21 2013
